alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Box Elder County through 1245 PM MDT... At 1200 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 18 miles northeast of Montello to 21 miles west of Utah Test and Training Range North. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Park Valley, Lynn, Lucin, Etna, Rosette and Grouse Creek. This includes Utah Route 30 between mile markers 3 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
